trans-unit.source: Manipulating XML in Visual Basic | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Modifica di XML in Visual Basic | Documenti di Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Manipulating XML in Visual Basic
trans-unit.target: Modifica di XML in Visual Basic

trans-unit.source: You can use *XML literals* to load XML from an external source such as a string, file, or stream.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare *valori letterali XML* caricare XML da un'origine esterna, ad esempio una stringa, un file o un flusso.

trans-unit.source: You can then use [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] to manipulate the XML and use [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](../../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/vbteclinqext_md.md)] to query the XML.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile utilizzare [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] per modificare il codice XML e utilizzare [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](../../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/vbteclinqext_md.md)] per eseguire query in XML.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: Contenuto della sezione

trans-unit.source: [How to: Load XML from a File, String, or Stream](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-load-xml-from-a-file-string-or-stream.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: Caricare XML da un file, da una stringa o da un flusso](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-load-xml-from-a-file-string-or-stream.md)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to load XML into an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> or <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> object from a text file, string, or stream.
trans-unit.target: Di seguito viene illustrato come caricare XML in un <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>o <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>oggetto da un file di testo, stringa o flusso.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Transform XML by Using LINQ](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-transform-xml-by-using-linq.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: Trasformare XML usando LINQ](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-transform-xml-by-using-linq.md)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to transform the contents of an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> object into a new XML document.
trans-unit.target: Di seguito viene illustrato come trasformare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>oggetto in un nuovo documento XML.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Modify XML Literals](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-modify-xml-literals.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: Modificare valori letterali XML](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-modify-xml-literals.md)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to modify the elements, attributes, and values in an XML literal.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come modificare gli elementi, attributi e valori in un valore letterale XML.
